Name: Archmage Ricka
About the game: Archmage Ricka is a series RPG developed by Alecubicsoft, published by OTAKU Plan. Archmage Ricka contains The Small Fry Dungeon and the Archmage, The Thief in the dungeon and the Archmage. STORY The Small Fry Dungeon and the Archmage In order to retrieve the illegal property embezzled by the evil Lord, Ricka received a mission to capture the Lord. But it was a trap. She fell into a dungeon arranged by the Lord in advance. Although the demons in the dungeon are weak, the existence of various traps makes it difficult to escape! The Thief in the dungeon and the Archmage The band of thieves ran into the dungeon! It's an underground dungeon full of traps and monsters and the soldiers can't get in there. Finally, bounties were put on the head of the thieves. But despite the perilous mission of going through the dungeon, the reward was little and no one dared to do it. ... All except Ricka the archmage. FEATURE Cute graphic 3D dungeon Auto battle[/list*]
